subject: Time Tracker Component Development Competitions: $14,000+ in prizes
body:
Hello sm1lies,

We've got 11 small TimeTracker assemblies, with a total of $14,650 in prizes, listed with the Development projects:

* TimeTracker Approval Phase II ($500.00)
* TimeTracker Admin User And Registration Phase II ($1,500.00)
* TimeTracker Audit Phase II ($1,000.00)
* TimeTracker Entries and Billing Phase II ($500.00)
* TimeTracker Invoice Phase II ($500.00)
* TimeTracker Invoice PDF Phase II ($500.00)
* TimeTracker Main Page Phase II ($700.00)
* TimeTracker My Account Config Phase II ($1,200.00)
* TimeTracker Notification Phase II ($1,200.00)
* TimeTracker Project And Client Phase II ($1,200.00)
* TimeTracker Reporting Phase II ($1,000.00)

Learn more here: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=113

Good luck!

- The TopCoder Software Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of new TopCoder development opportunities.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
